articles.title: About BIOS2 education
articles.description: We train graduate students in Data Science and Organizational/Communication skills

articles.title: Spatial materials
articles.contents:
[EN] Contents for the “Spatial statistics in ecology” training offered by Philippe Marchand in January 2021 as part of the BIOS2 program. Original repository can be found here.
[FR] Contenu de la formation “Statistiques spatiales en écologie” offerte par Philippe Marchand en janvier 2021 dans le cadre du programme BIOS2. Le repositoire original se trouve ici.
